CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 1, 1965, pg. 14 reads: "Bishop's Cabinet - Bishop Gordon E. Vaughn (seated, second from left) was surrounded by members of his official cabinet, during the recent session of the 16th annual convocation, held at First Church, Miller St. Mother Ida B. Martin (left) is supervisor of the Women's Department.  Mrs. Vaughn and the Rt. Rev. J.D. Myers of Erie, assistant Bishop of the state, are at the right.  Others are (standing, left to right) Elder W.R. Shields, state president, YPWW; Elder Curtis Goodnight, state treasurer; Elder S. Threats of New Castle, state expediter; Elder J.H. Stevenson, chairman of the board of elders; Elder Herbert Standback, superintendent of the state S.S. Department, and Elder H.B. Evans of Indianola, Pa., financial secretary.  Bishop Vaughn presided over the two-week session.  Senior Elder Barto Florence is seen in the right background. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, seated from left: Ida B. Martin, Bishop Gordon E. Vaughn and Mrs. Vaughn, and Rev. J.D. Myers; standing: W.R. Shields, Curtis Goodnight, S. Threats, J.H. Stevenson, Herbert Standback, and H.B. Evans; Barto Florence seated in right background, posed in front of altar in Church of God in Christ, for 16th annual convocation, another version
